titles: A letter from divers of the gentry of the county of Lincolne to his Excellency the Lord General Monck.
author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
publisher: Printed for Richard Lowndes at the White Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard,
notes: With a declaration desiring a Free Parliament.
The letter is dated 7 Febr. 1659; both letter and declaration were presented to him on 16 Feb. 1659 [i.e. 1660].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
